narrative.narrative: Zoom was a transatlantic low fare airline that lasted from May 2002 to August 2008. It was based in Ottawa and also had bases at Toronto and Montreal. It also operated out o Vancouver,Calgary,Winnipeg and Halifax. It had three destinations in the U.S (Ft. Lauderdale,New York JFK,San Diego),five in the Caribbean,one in Guyana in Souther America,one in Thailand in Asia,five in the UK including London Gatwick,Manchester,Belfast,Glasgow and Cardiff. Paris,Rome and Amsterdam are other ones in Europe it served. At the end they had three 767-300ER's and two 757-200's. It also had the subsidiary Zoom Airlines Limited based at London Gatwick from August 2006 to the end. The airline was founded by the two Scottish brothers Hugh and John Boyle who had started at least two tour and holiday companies in Scotland with much success before founding Zoom.
